Void comes equipped with a robust set of AI-powered features similar to what you’d find in Cursor, but with the added benefit of being open-source and privacy-focused:

name: voideditor/void
snippet:
Void is the open-source Cursor alternative. Use AI agents on your codebase, checkpoint and visualize changes , and bring any model or host locally. Read more
Void is the open-source Cursor alternative. Use AI agents on your codebase, checkpoint and visualize changes, and bring any model or host locally. Void sends messages directly to providers without retaining your data. This repo contains the full sourcecode for Void. If you're new, welcome!

name: Void: The open source Cursor alternative
snippet:
File system awareness : Void can answer questions about your entire codebase. · View and edit underlying prompts: Void lets you open up the hood and ... Read more
TL;DR: Void is the open source Cursor alternative. It offers the AI features of modern AI coding tools, while allowing you to host your own AI model locally and keep your data private.
